dt: {bc}the practical {d_link|application|application} of knowledge especially in a particular area {bc}{sx|engineering||2}
{bc}a capability given by the practical application of knowledge
{bc}a manner of accomplishing a task especially using {d_link|technical|technical:1} processes, methods, or knowledge
{bc}the specialized aspects of a particular field of endeavor

quotes.t: … all {qword}technology{/qword} and energy revving up for the greatest clash of arms in history.

One by one, the pieces take flight: a parachute, the stowed Martian balloon—a Montgolfiere hot-air type, named for the French brothers who pioneered the {qword}technology{/qword} in 1782—and a sensor package with guidance system, radio transmitter, and video camera.

The rapid shift in {qword}technology{/qword} over the last 10 years has created an entirely new world in which viruses can replicate. While in 1989, viruses were primarily spread by "sneakernet," as users walked diskettes from machine to machine, modern viruses … are capable of spreading around the world in the blink of a digital eye.

There's no question the industry has been subjected to a great deal of competitive pressure over the past decade or so, with promises of more to come as the Internet and wireless {qword}technology{/qword} transform the way Americans receive news and information.

et: earlier, "treatise on an art, terminology, branch of knowledge dealing with the applied arts," borrowed from New Latin {it}technologia{/it} "systematic treatment (of grammar or rhetoric), systematic description of the arts and sciences," borrowed from Greek {it}technología{/it} "systematic treatment (of grammar or rhetoric)," from {it}téchnē{/it} "art, craft, proficiency in an art or craft, systematic method of performing or engaging in an art" + {it}-o-{/it} {et_link|-o-|-o-} + {it}-logia{/it} {et_link|-logy|-logy} {ma}{mat|technical:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: the practical application of knowledge especially in a particular area : engineering
a capability given by the practical application of knowledge
a manner of accomplishing a task especially using technical processes, methods, or knowledge

dt: {bc}scientific technology involving the production or use of advanced or sophisticated devices especially in the fields of electronics and computers

shortdef: scientific technology involving the production or use of advanced or sophisticated devices especially in the fields of electronics and computers

dt: {bc}the technology involving the development, maintenance, and use of computer systems, software, and networks for the processing and distribution of data

shortdef: the technology involving the development, maintenance, and use of computer systems, software, and networks for the processing and distribution of data
